name: Arrested
definition: Seize (someone) by legal authority and take into custody.

name: Car Chase
definition: Vehicular hot pursuit of suspects by law enforcers.

name: Crying
definition: Shedding of tears (or welling of tears in the eyes) in response to an emotional state.

name: Detained
definition: To hold or keep in or as if in custody

name: Fight
definition: Take part in a violent struggle involving the exchange of physical blows or the use of weapons.

name: Foot Chase
definition: Pursue on foot in order to catch or catch up with.

name: Handcuffed
definition: Put handcuffs on (someone).

name: Handshake
definition: An act of shaking a person's hand with one's own.

name: Hogtied
definition: Secure by fastening together the hands and feet (of a person) or all four feet (of an animal)

name: K9 Used
definition: A dog trained to aid the police, as in tracking criminals or detecting controlled substances.

name: Cop Take Down
definition: An act of bringing one's opponent to the ground

name: Rights Read
definition: Miranda rights, is a right to silence warning given by police in the United States to criminal suspects in police custody (or in a custodial interrogation) before they are interrogated to preserve the admissibility of their statements against them in criminal proceedings.
example: You have the right to remain silent and refuse to answer questions; Anything you say may be used against you in a court of law; You have the right to consult an attorney before speaking to the police and to have an attorney present during questioning now or in the future.; If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be appointed for you before any questioning if you wish.; If you decide to answer questions now without an attorney present, you will still have the right to stop answering at any time until you talk to an attorney.; Knowing and understanding your rights as I have explained them to you, are you willing to answer my questions without an attorney present?

name: Search
definition: Try to find something by looking or otherwise seeking carefully and thoroughly.

name: Traffic Stop
definition: Being pulled over, is a temporary detention of a driver of a vehicle by police to investigate a possible crime or minor violation of law.

name: Warning
definition: A warning issued by the officer is a statement that the motorist has committed some offense, but is being spared the actual citation.

name: Beer Can
definition: An aluminium can for beer.

name: Drunk Walking
definition: Walking around under heavy influence of alcohol

name: DUI Test
definition: Standardized Field Sobriety Test (SFST) is a battery of 3 tests performed during a traffic stop in order to determine if a driver is impaired. The 3 tests that make up the SFST are the horizontal gaze nystagmus (HGN), the walk-and-turn, and the one-leg stand tests.

name: Alcohol
definition: Any fermented liquor, such as wine, beer, or distilled spirit, that contains ethyl alcohol, or ethanol

name: Open Container
definition: Refers to having any opened alcoholic beverage in an openly public places such as sidewalks, parks and vehicles.

name: Underage Drinking
definition: The consumption of alcohol under a legally specified age, usually before one's 21st birthday.

name: Cocaine
definition: An addictive drug derived from coca or prepared synthetically, used as an illegal stimulant and sometimes medicinally as a local anesthetic.

name: Drug Paraphernalia
definition: Any equipment, product, accessory, or material that is modified for making, using, or concealing drugs, typically for recreational purposes

name: Meth
definition: The drug methamphetamine.

name: Meth Pipe
definition: A hollow glass bulb, with an extruding shaft, used for vaporizing methamphetamine or crystal meth, in order to inhale the vapor for its stimulating properties

name: Needle
definition: An instrument (as for the injection of medicine or the withdrawal of bodily fluids) that consists of a hollow barrel fitted with a plunger and a hollow needle

name: PCP
definition: Slang for the drug phencyclidine. Also known as angeldust. Probably the scariest of all drugs. Was used as a horse tranquilizer. Makes the user hallucinate, become extremely violent, and not feel anything. People have been known to do horrible things to themselves while under the influence of PCP.

name: Pills
definition: Small round mass of solid medicine to be swallowed whole.

name: Spoon
definition: Spoons, bottle caps, or other containers used to dissolve drugs

name: Weed Found
definition: Cannabis also known as marijuana among several other names, found in vehicle or on a person or in belongings.

name: Weed Pipe
definition: Pipe or any other instrument in which the marijuana is placed (packed) to be smoked.

name: Bodily Fluids
definition: Liquids originating from inside the bodies of living people.
example: Blood, Feces, Breast Milk, Semen, Saliva, Urine, Vomit, etc.

name: Knife
definition: An instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon.

name: Sex Toy
definition: An object or device used for sexual stimulation or to enhance sexual pleasure.

name: Assault Rifle
definition: A selective-fire rifle that uses an intermediate cartridge and a detachable magazine.

name: Handgun
definition: A gun designed for use by one hand, especially a pistol or revolver.

name: Gun Found
definition: A handgun, rifle, or shotgun found in vehicle or on a person or in belongings.

name: Shotgun
definition: A smooth bore gun for firing small shot at short range.

name: Shots Fired
definition: A handgun, rifle, or shotgun discharged.

name: Taser
definition: Conducted electrical weapon (CEW) is an electroshock weapon that fires two small dart-like electrodes, which stay connected to the main unit by conductors, to deliver electric current to disrupt voluntary control of muscles causing 'neuromuscular incapacitation'.

quotes.quote: 'Police! Stop right there. You're gonna get tased. You're gonna get tased'
quotes.author: Trooper Todd Poole

name: Car Seat
definition: A portable seat for an infant or a small child that attaches to an automobile seat and holds the child safely.

name: Broken Taillight
definition: A non-functioning red light at the rear of a motor vehicle, motorcycle, or bicycle.

name: Broken Headlight
definition: A non-functioning light at the front of a motor vehicle or motorcycle.

name: Domestic Disturbance
definition: A dispute requiring police response that involves two or more people engaged in an intimate relationship (married or divorced couples, live-in lovers, people on a first date, problems between adults and children, or adults and elderly parents).

name: Expired Licence
definition: Out of date Driver's License.

name: Expired Tags
definition: Out of date tags/stickers on vehicle tag/licence plate.

name: Felony Warrant
definition: The courts can issue a warrant authorizing the police to arrest and charge the suspect with a felony crime.

name: Hooker
definition: Slang term for a prostitute or someone who exchanges sex for money.

name: No ID
definition: Is not in possession of a Driver's Licence or a legal form of identification

name: Lights Off
definition: Operating a vehicle on a public highway during the period from one-half hour after sunset to one-half hour before sunrise or at any other time when windshield wipers are in use, as a result of rain, sleet, snow, hail or other unfavorable atmospheric condition, and at such other times as visibility for a distance of one thousand feet ahead of such motor vehicle is not clear, lighted head lamps turned on.

name: No Seat Belt
definition: Operating a vehicle on a public highway without waring three-point seat belt.

name: Sex In Car
definition: Sexual activity, including sexual intercourse or other act performed with another for sexual gratification, in a vehicle.

name: Stolen Car
definition: Motor vehicle theft or grand theft auto is the criminal act of stealing or attempting to steal any motor vehicle, usually an automobile.

name: Suspended License
definition: Administrative License Revocation or ALR is when a driver's license is taken away by law enforcement at the time of the offense or stop by police upon the failure or refusal of a chemical test.

name: Restricted License
definition: Allow the holder to drive for specific purposes. These might include driving to and from work or school, to seek medical treatment or to go to a grocery store.

name: Out of State License
definition: Possesses a Driver's License from another state

name: Tag Light
definition: A light that illuminates license plate/tag

name: Accident
definition: A vehicle, motorcycle, bicycle that strikes or collides another vehicle, a stationary object, a pedestrian, or an animal.

name: Helicopter
definition: An aircraft capable of hover, vertical flight, and horizontal flight in any direction.

name: No Shoes
definition: Not wearing covering for the feet

name: Sticks
definition: Sgt. Sean 'Sticks' Larkin with the Gang Unit of the Tulsa Police Department

name: Don't Film Me
definition: When someone doesn't want to be filmed by the Live PD crew.

name: Not My Car
definition: Someone claims that it's not their car.

name: Not My Drugs
definition: Someone claims that it's not their drugs

name: Ridin' Dirty
definition: Driving with a illegal weapon or drugs. First coined by Houston Rap group U.G.K.(Bun B and Pimp C) In a song 'ridin dirty'

name: Thank You
definition: When someone thanks an officer.

name: Ambulance
definition: A vehicle specially equipped for taking sick or injured people to and from the hospital, especially in emergencies.

name: Blood
definition: The bodily fluid that circulates in the heart, arteries, capillaries, and veins of a vertebrate animal carrying nourishment and oxygen to and bringing away waste products from all parts of the body

name: Fire
definition: Combustion or burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and typically give out bright light, heat, and smoke.

name: No Pants
definition: Someone isn't wearing pants or shorts

name: Bicycle
definition: A vehicle composed of two wheels held in a frame one behind the other, propelled by pedals and steered with handlebars attached to the front wheel.

name: Wild Animal
definition: An animal living in a state of nature; not tamed or domesticated

name: Farm Animal
definition: Any domestic species of cattle, sheep, swine, goats, llamas, or horses

name: Domestic Animal
definition: Any of various animals that have been tamed and made fit for a human environment

name: Kitty Cat
definition: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws. It is widely kept as a pet or for catching mice, and many breeds have been developed.

name: Clenched Buttocks
definition: Making one tighten the buttocks through extreme fear or embarrassment

name: DUI Checkpoint
definition: Sobriety checkpoints are police stops, or checkpoints, where officers are set up on a roadway to randomly stop vehicles to check for impaired drivers. These are usually set up during times when impaired driving is known to happen, such as holiday weekends.

name: Motorcycle Chase
definition: Motorcycle hot pursuit of suspects by law enforcers.

name: Spitting
definition: Eject saliva forcibly from one's mouth, sometimes as a gesture of contempt or anger.

name: New Department
definition: A new department on Live PD

name: Burglary
definition: Entry into a building illegally with intent to commit a crime, especially theft.

name: Assault
definition: An assault is carried out by a threat of bodily harm coupled with an apparent, present ability to cause the harm.

name: No Headlights
definition: When the lights at the front of a motor vehicle or motorcycle are not turned on.

name: Spike Strip
definition: Is a device used to impede or stop the movement of wheeled vehicles by puncturing their tires.

name: Cough Syrup
definition: DXM or liquid medicine to either to suppress or expectorate a cough, or to get intoxicated

name: SWAT
definition: Special Weapons and Tactics: a military-like unit within the US police force, trained to deal with specially dangerous situations, such as hostage-taking and riots.

name: Spit Hood
definition: Spit hoods (also known as “spit masks”) have been increasingly used by police and other law enforcement officers in recent years. A spit hood, or spit mask, is a fabric covering or 'hood' that can be placed over a person's head and secured at the neck with an elastic band.

name: Camouflage
definition: The disguising of military personnel, equipment, and installations by painting or covering them to make them blend in with their surroundings.

name: Crown Royal Bag
definition: Placing illegal items inside a Crown Royal (Canadian Whisky) bag.

name: Brick O' Weed
definition: A pound (or more) of marijuana that is compacted into a cube, thus resembling a brick. This is a process that is usually done for the purpose of shipping and/or smuggling the substance.

name: Full Moon
definition: The phase of the moon in which its whole disk is illuminated.

name: Actin' A Fool
definition: Lacking or exhibiting a lack of good sense or judgment.

name: Gonna Get Tased
definition: When a law enforcement officer warns a suspect that he is about to use a taser/CEW) on him unless he complies.

quotes.quote: 'Police! Stop right there. You're gonna get tased. You're gonna get tased'
quotes.author: Trooper Todd Poole

name: Hoopty
definition: A large older automobile, often in poor condition; jalopy.

name: Good Samaritan
definition: A charitable or helpful person

name: LivePD Shoutout
definition: A message of congratulation, support, or appreciation for Live PD.

name: Blue Door Motel
definition: The Palmetto Inn in Columbia, SC

name: Goober Grazing
definition: When being searched and the officers comes in contact with suspects genitals

name: Barking Dog
definition: When a canine (other than police K9) barks or whines.

name: Snake
definition: A long limbless reptile that has no eyelids, a short tail, and jaws that are capable of considerable extension. Some snakes have a venomous bite.

name: Mouth Salad
definition: The act in which a person consumes marijuana in order to hide from law enforcement officers

name: Grilling
definition: Cook (something) using a bbq grill.

name: Hit & Run
definition: The crime of a driver of a vehicle who is involved in a collision with another vehicle, property or human being, who knowingly fails to stop to give his/her name, license number, and other information as required by statute to the injured party, a witness, or law enforcement officers.

name: Drugs Tossed
definition: Where drugs are tossed or thrown by a person

name: Touch Tail Light
definition: Police officers touch the tail light of the vehicles in order to leave their fingerprints on it.

name: Breathalyzer
definition: A device used by police for measuring the amount of alcohol in a driver's breath.

name: Ammunition
definition: A supply or quantity of bullets and shells.

name: Socks 'n Slides
definition: Someone wearing sandals with socks

name: Ankle Bracelet
definition: An ankle monitor (also known as a tether, or ankle bracelet) is a homing device that defendants under house arrest or parole are required to wear. At all times, the ankle monitor sends a radio frequency signal containing location and other information to a receiver.

name: Latex Gloves
definition: Are natural material, made out of rubber. They are a popular choice of protective glove for medical, industrial, or law enforcement use. The primary reason people would choose an alternative to latex is because many people suffer from latex allergies.

name: Obama Mart
definition: Obama Gas Station in Columbia, SC frequently seen on Live PD

name: CSI
definition: Crime Scene Investigation. Forensic science technician that collects, identifies, classifies, and analyzes physical evidence related to criminal investigations

name: Ridin' Dirty Trifecta
definition: Driving while having three of the following: illegal weapon, drugs, under the influence, warrants, suspended licence, stolen car or motorcycle, etc.

name: Sex Offender
definition: A person who has committed a sex crime

name: In Studio Guest
definition: Coming Soon

name: Littering
definition: A person, from a vehicle or otherwise, that dumps, throws, drops, deposit,s discards, or otherwise disposes of litter or other solid waste upon public or private property or waters including, but not limited to, a highway, park, beach, campground, forest land, recreational area, trailer park, road, street, or alley.

name: Fist Bump
definition: A fist bump (or power five,) is a gesture similar in meaning to a handshake or high five. A fist bump can also be a symbol of giving respect or approval. It can be followed by various other hand and body gestures and may be part of a dap greeting.

name: Sagging Pants
definition: is a manner of wearing trousers or jeans which sag so that the top of the trousers or jeans are significantly below the waist, sometimes revealing much of the underwear.

name: LivePD Natlie
definition: Coming Soon

name: Destroying Evidence
definition: Coming Soon

name: K-LAW
definition: Deputy Kevin Lawrence with Richland County Sheriff’s Department

name: Trooper Poole Smiling
definition: The rarely seen, Trooper Poole Smiling

name: Narcan
definition: narcan (nar-kan) noun: Brand name of the medical drug Naloxone, which serves as an antidote to opiod overdose.

name: Brass Knuckles
definition: Coming Soon

name: Scales
definition: Coming Soon

name: Selfie
definition: A photograph that one has taken of oneself, typically one taken with a smartphone or webcam and shared via social media.

name: Dog Bite
definition: Coming Soon

name: Stolen Tags
definition: Coming Soon

name: Man Bun
definition: Coming Soon

name: Beer Gut
definition: Coming Soon

name: 'Copastetic'
definition: Street slang for everythings good, ok, chill. A favorite of Master Deputy Mark Laureano.

name: Moobs
definition: A combination of the words 'man' and 'boobs.' This is what happens when fat gathers in a male's chest area, and gives him the appearance of having breasts. Usually seen in overweight males, but can strangely also occur in men who are not really overweight.

name: Jaws of Life
definition: A hydraulic apparatus used to pry apart the wreckage of crashed vehicles in order to free people trapped inside.

name: Barefoot
definition: Not wearing shoes. Usually in severe need of pedicure.

name: Daisy Dukes
definition: Shorts shorts. Usually includes one or more of the following: exposed butt cheeks, generous muffin top, severe wedgie, picking of said wedgie or cellulite.

name: Probation
definition: The release of an offender from detention, subject to a period of good behavior under supervision. Usually with conditions.

name: Constitutionalist
definition: Individuals who believe the idea, often associated with the political theories of John Locke and the founders of the American republic, that government can and should be legally limited in its powers, and that its authority or legitimacy depends on its observing these limitations.

name: Fake ID
definition: Federal or State identification that is not real

name: Cycling Dirty
definition: Riding a bicycle while drunk or high. Known to ride in middle of the street with broken/no light.

name: Child Neglect
definition: Child neglect is a form of child abuse, and is a deficit in meeting a child's basic needs, including the failure to provide adequate health care, supervision, clothing, nutrition, housing as well as their physical, emotional, social, educational and safety needs.

name: 'Porn' Again
definition: Usually involves Trooper Casey. Stops are usually made when citizen is leaving a porn store. Almost always leads to embarrassment.

name: Cum Inn
definition: Cum Inn Bar & Grill, 18221 E Appleway Ave, Spokane Valley, WA 99016...a favorite of LivePD viewers.

name: Dan Abrams is 'Pun'ny
definition: Puns made by LivePD host Dan Abrams.

name: Wad of Cash
definition: A 'wad of cash' must consist of more than 20 (about) bills, of any denomination and can be folded, rolled, crumbled, etc.

name: Pink Handcuffs
definition: Deputy Rebecca Loeb of Lake County, IL, has fancy pink handcuffs.

quotes.quote: 'You gonna put those pink things on me?'
quotes.author: Fictional suspect

name: Tweaker
definition: Slang term for someone exhibiting compulsive or repetitive behaviour due to the use of stimulants, most commonly methamphetamine.

name: Frequent Flyer
definition: Individual who has been arrested multiple times by police or a location/individual that is frequently visited by police.
